GSD.product_version: versions from v3.7 to before v5.10.110
GSD.description:
media: stk1160: If start stream fails, return buffers with VB2_BUF_STATE_QUEUED

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit 4d68603cc4382174bc1e7d532e10675c48c6b257, it was introduced in version v3.7 by commit 8ac456495a33d9466076fea94594181ceefb76d9. For more details please see the references link.
